Package com.uco.ucodgt.mvc.controller.commonFunctions

Class ForCheckPenalty

java.lang.Object
com.uco.ucodgt.mvc.controller.commonFunctions.ForCheckPenalty
public class ForCheckPenalty extends Object
This class provides common functions for checking penalty-related information.

      Returns:

    • checkDatesPenalties

      public static boolean checkDatesPenalties(String from, String to)
      Checks if the provided start and end dates are valid.
      Parameters:
      from - The start date.
      to - The end date.
      Returns:
      True if the start date is before the end date, false otherwise.

      Returns:

    • checkCardData

      public static boolean checkCardData(String cvv, String number, String caducity)
      Checks if the provided CVV, card number, and expiration date form a valid card data.
      Parameters:
      cvv - The CVV (Card Verification Value).
      number - The card number.
      caducity - The expiration date of the card.
      Returns:
      True if the card data is valid, false otherwise.
